title: Diatom-derived extracellular polymeric substances form eco-corona and enhance stability of silver nanoparticles
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00232F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Rocco Gasco, Isabelle A. M. Worms, Arin Kantarciyan, Vera I. Slaveykova
Extracellular polymeric substances from the diatom Cyclotella meneghiniana adsorb onto citrate-coated nAg, forming an eco-corona and reducing nanoparticle dissolution and aggregation.
